text: Carlos Héctor Campos Silva (February 14, 1937 – November 11, 2020) was a Chilean footballer. ==Career== Campos played for Universidad de Chile. He scored 184 goals for the club, and 18 times for the Chilean national team. Campos died on November 11, 2020 in Ovalle at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:1966 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from Santiago
title: Carlos Campos
